DisabledTests.BadCBCPadding*: Fuzzer mode has no CBC padding.
DisabledTests.DTLSIgnoreBadPackets*: Fuzzer mode has no bad packets.
DisabledTests.TLSFatalBadPackets: Fuzzer mode has no bad packets.
DisabledTests.*-BadRecord*: Fuzzer mode has no bad packets.
DisabledTests.BadRSAClientKeyExchange*: Fuzzer mode does not notice a bad premaster secret.
DisabledTests.TrailingMessageData-TLS13-ServerHello-*: Fuzzer mode will not read the peer's alert as a MAC error
DisabledTests.UnexpectedUnencryptedExtension-Client-TL: Fuzzer mode will not read the peer's alert as a MAC error
DisabledTests.UnknownUnencryptedExtension-Client-TLS13: Fuzzer mode will not read the peer's alert as a MAC error
DisabledTests.WrongMessageType-TLS13-ServerHello-*: Fuzzer mode will not read the peer's alert as a MAC error
DisabledTests.CurveTest-Invalid-*-Client-*-TLS13: Fuzzer mode will not read the peer's alert as a MAC error
DisabledTests.BadECDSA-*: Fuzzer mode always accepts a signature.
DisabledTests.*-InvalidSignature-*: Fuzzer mode always accepts a signature.
DisabledTests.Verify-*Auth-SignatureType*: Fuzzer mode always accepts a signature.
DisabledTests.ECDSACurveMismatch-Verify-TLS13*: Fuzzer mode always accepts a signature.
DisabledTests.InvalidChannelIDSignature-*: Fuzzer mode always accepts a signature.
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-CipherNotPreferred*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-DeclineBadCipher*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-DeclineCrossVersion*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.TicketCallback-SingleCall-*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.CorruptTicket-*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.*RejectTicket-Server-*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.ShimTicketRewritable*: Fuzzer mode does not encrypt tickets.
DisabledTests.Resume-Server-*Binder*: Fuzzer mode does not check binders.
DisabledTests.SkipEarlyData*: Trial decryption does not work with the NULL cipher.
DisabledTests.EarlyDataChannelID-OfferBoth-Server-*: Trial decryption does not work with the NULL cipher.
DisabledTests.EarlyDataChannelID-AcceptChannelID-Clien: Trial decryption does not work with the NULL cipher.

DisabledTests.UnencryptedEncryptedExtensions: The NULL cipher will not notice that the peer didn't change keys.
DisabledTests.AppDataBeforeTLS13KeyChange*: The NULL cipher will not notice that the peer didn't change keys.
DisabledTests.Renegotiate-Client-BadExt*: Fuzzer mode does not check renegotiation_info.
DisabledTests.CBCRecordSplitting*: Fuzzer mode does not implement record-splitting.
DisabledTests.*-ECH-Server-Decline*: Encryption with wrong ECHConfig will not fail because fuzzer mode skips HPKE decryption.
